posts.html:
Last updated: 24 October 2024

PulseCraft (“we”, “our”, “us”) operates the PulseCraft mobile application (the “App”).

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our App.

Information Collection and Use

We do not collect personally identifiable information unless you voluntarily provide it. The App may collect anonymous data for improving user experience, such as usage statistics.

Log Data

We collect log data such as the device’s IP address, device name, and operating system when the App experiences errors or crashes. This helps us improve the app.

Cookies

We do not use cookies in the App.

Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services to enhance the App’s functionality (e.g., analytics tools). These services may collect and store information according to their privacy policies.

Security

We value your trust in providing your data and strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

Links to Other Sites

Our App may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those third-party websites.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, contact us at ccode42tiger [a@t] iCloud.com.
posts.plaintext:
Last updated: 24 October 2024

PulseCraft (“we”, “our”, “us”) operates the PulseCraft mobile application (the “App”).

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our App.


Information Collection and Use

We do not collect personally identifiable information unless you voluntarily provide it. The App may collect anonymous data for improving user experience, such as usage statistics.


Log Data

We collect log data such as the device’s IP address, device name, and operating system when the App experiences errors or crashes. This helps us improve the app.


Cookies

We do not use cookies in the App.


Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services to enhance the App’s functionality (e.g., analytics tools). These services may collect and store information according to their privacy policies.


Security

We value your trust in providing your data and strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.


Links to Other Sites

Our App may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those third-party websites.


Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any changes.


Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, contact us at ccode42tiger [a@t] iCloud.com.

posts.html:
Whether you're a beginner or a pro, PulseCraft makes exploring the world of 3D design and 3d animation easy and enjoyable. Whether you're crafting simple models for fun or building concepts, this app provides powerful tools while maintaining a user-friendly experience for all skill levels.

Key Features:

  • Intuitive Interface - A clean, user-friendly interface that simplifies the 3D design process. Navigate seamlessly whether you're just starting out or have years of experience.
  • Ready-to-Use Basic Shapes - Instantly access a wide variety of pre-built shapes and objects, perfect for quickly assembling models or starting projects.
  • Materials Library - Enhance your designs with an extensive library of materials and textures to bring your creations to life.
  • Camera and Lighting Controls - Adjust your camera angles and lighting setups effortlessly to create professional-quality 3D visuals.
  • Animation Capabilities - Bring your designs to life with simple animation tools, ideal for basic animations.
  • Real-Time Previews - See changes in real time as you work, with instant visual feedback, so you can fine-tune every detail without waiting for renders.
  • Export Options - Easily export your projects in various file formats to share on socials.and much more!
posts.plaintext:
Whether you're a beginner or a pro, PulseCraft makes exploring the world of 3D design and 3d animation easy and enjoyable. Whether you're crafting simple models for fun or building concepts, this app provides powerful tools while maintaining a user-friendly experience for all skill levels.


Key Features:

 * Intuitive Interface - A clean, user-friendly interface that simplifies the 3D design process. Navigate seamlessly whether you're just starting out or have years of experience.
 * Ready-to-Use Basic Shapes - Instantly access a wide variety of pre-built shapes and objects, perfect for quickly assembling models or starting projects.
 * Materials Library - Enhance your designs with an extensive library of materials and textures to bring your creations to life.
 * Camera and Lighting Controls - Adjust your camera angles and lighting setups effortlessly to create professional-quality 3D visuals.
 * Animation Capabilities - Bring your designs to life with simple animation tools, ideal for basic animations.
 * Real-Time Previews - See changes in real time as you work, with instant visual feedback, so you can fine-tune every detail without waiting for renders.
 * Export Options - Easily export your projects in various file formats to share on socials.and much more!
